column3: “Super Sour OG is an amazing hybrid strain, with its beautiful extremely pungent crystallized nugs, along with its amazing OG/Diesel taste, it's just a perfect hybrid and a damn strong one at that. Definitely a true 50/50, definitely hit me hard in the head and body which I loved! I'd easily recommend this to people with anxiety or depression, it can be smoked daily or nightly with great effects at each time. It's jus...”

“Name SUPER SOUR OG OD
Store The Green Planet
Grower MRX LABS
THC % 22.9 0.06 % SATIVA
Effects Happy, Relaxed
Medical Depression, Pain
 


I normally smoke really heavy indicas, for pain relief, and also because I like to have a relaxed body when I read or relax. Today, however, I wanted to really enjoy some house music (did you know Jessi Andrews is a DJ?!), so I slapped on the cans and fired out some Super Sour OG O...”

“Pathway. 
Used the crafty vaporizer with less than a gram. Shared between 3 people. Had to pack another bowl after about an hour in half. Vape quality very smooth. Earthy in taste. Didn't noticed any fruit flavors. 


Setting. 
I was at home with ambient music. Lights turn down with a comfortable sofa. It did not feel like gorilla glue where I was glued to the couch. 

Food. 
Consumed a sweeten coffee beverage from 8...”

“the fact that I am writing a review says it all. I am a stoner from Washington during the 90's and sticky green bud. Recreational Weed isnt nearly as good and doesn't last as long. super sour kush was an ven balance of happy and spacey with a 
chill relaxed mood  but not couch locked. I am pie eyed and stupidly grinning.”
“mother of all strains. gives you a very wide variety of effects; balanced, yet powerful. I will choose this strain every time”
“I'm cleaning my room sans munchies on this smoke.”

“Name SUPER SOUR OG OD
Store The Green Planet
Grower MRX LABS
THC % 22.9 0.06 % SATIVA
Effects Happy, Relaxed
Medical Depression, Pain


I normally smoke really heavy indicas, for pain relief, and also because I like to have a relaxed body when I read or relax. Today, however, I wanted to really enjoy some house music (did you know Jessi Andrews is a DJ?!), so I slapped on the cans and fired out some Super Sour OG OD ...”
“I like the taste and smell of the Super Sour, but it's a little high in the THC for me.”
“special effect: you don't think about ur LADY !:)”

“It's safe to say that this strain knocked me on my a**. I was so blazed that I was in couch-lock mode luckily I prepared for it ahead of time by grabbing some munchies and drinks. I highly recommend this strain it went way above my expectations I will definitely try it again.”
“amazing weed, good for working and being productive just hit my sales bonus while enhcnated under this plants potion, very dense and pungent”
“instantly feel better. nice and mellow. great stuff”
“Yeeeeeeew”
“so far so good. instant head high. nature scent. this helped me out a lot today, would recommend to friends.”

“I suffer from Chronic back pain due to scoliosis and a messed up back surgery. I was able to get this strain in a BHO crumble form. It is very pungent and it tastes amazing. I decarb my concentrate and then infuse it with coconut oil and out into an eyedropper or capsule. I am finding the best relief from the sublingual dosing. It takes effect quickly and relaxes my muscle spasms. Too much and I will be sleeping like...”
“Mostly feel relaxed & happy”
“Yeeeeeeew”
“Made me feel stupid high but then I felt really relaxed and content”
“It has a very og earthy taste the pheno I had very body high last for 45mins to hr great for night time”
“Really nice hybrid strain! Perfect head body balance and the smell is amazing.”

“This is the first strain with a Diesel component that I have really liked. This 50/50 hybrid from Emerald Triangle Cannabis, that combines well-known strains Blueberry, Sour Diesel, and OG Kush with Lost Coast OG. Its overall taste is immediately Sour Blueberry.  I am a Sour strain lover and this newest strain from my garden is really one of my new fave strains in my current selection.”
“This strain is super high in THC. It tested in at 28% and seemed to lean more on the sativa side. Makes you want to move and dance!”

“This strain is just plain ol' FUN!!!!   No other way to say it.  Watching Ohio State vs Michigan football and can not wait to pack another bowl and eat.  Definitely an amazing strain.  Make sure you get a decent amount because you will be rolling Spliffs of this for the next 12 hours!!!!”
“amazing weed, good for working and being productive just hit my sales bonus while enhcnated under this plants potion, very dense and pungent”
“This ½ and ½ hybrid is great any time of the day. Good for pain, and stress.”

“Fantastic all-day smoke. The only downside is how good it tastes—which will have you using more than you really need, gluing you to your seat for a good couple of hours, talking about all the things you need to do (instead of just doing them) lol.”
“A great day or night smoke that has sativa type effects. Tested high at almost 29% and is best left for experienced stoners.”
“Pretty good strain. Nice berry flavor. Hint of lemon and earthiness. Smooth inhales. Exhales are good.”

“Highly recommended!! This one gets on top and takes you on a ride!! Very OG and VERY pungent and lemony, with a pleasant aftertaste. The sample I received was very high testing on the THC, but even still I was impressed with the effect and speed of onset. Made me very relaxed and reduced my anxiety almost immediately.  It put me in a completely different head space. I now have a new holy grail strain to find clones o...”
“It made me feel so relaxed that I went to sleep which is great because I get insomnia a lot.”
“good body high taste good tho”
“very tangy sour flavours will linger in your respiratory organs for quite a while. heavy hitter but sorta pulls you both ways so your not couch Locked but will roam around aimlessly”

“DANKNKKKKK I DIDNT FEEL LAZY AT ALL I ENED UP CLEANING MY ROOM AND I FEEL GREAT RIGHT NOW BLAZED BUT UPLIFTED READY TO DO ANYTHING !!! Such a great feeling highly recommend to anyone looking to be be active”

“Very nice strain. Definitely felt euphoria and settled me out in the evening. Surprisingly though, I only took it at night. I felt the high and was a tad bit giggly then I decided to go to sleep so I can get up early the next morning. Slept very well and my appetite came back for sure. Lol”
“Very good uplifting feeling that is very remarkable it takes all the pain depression right away”
“This strain has such a fresh tasting strain that has tremendous effects towards inflammation and pain.”
“This strain is very uplifting and also relaxing it took away all the pain that I  had throughout my intire mind and body”
